description: The girls of the other world continue to battle. Black★Rock Shooter kills Deadmaster, which causes Mato to experience intense negative emotions. Mato’s mind is transferred into the body of Black★Rock Shooter, who goes berserk. Black Gold Saw challenges her to a fight in order to stop her, but is out of Shooter’s league and is quickly overcome. Mato’s mind hasn’t returned to her own world, but Yu carries her body over to Saya...

titles.title: Aru Hazu mo Nai Ano Toki no Kibou
Ein Hoffnungsschimmer, den es nie hätte geben sollen
Hope That Time There Shouldn`t Have Been Any
あるはずもないあの時の希望
